sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source2

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Exists1 sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
source1, source2 exists(toString(source1@movie) == source2@movie,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
